name: Blueberry Quinoa with Lemon Glaze
author: Paula DiBacco
summary: Healthy alternative if you want some dessert. Good to make night before if using it as a dessert or breakfast item.
directions: Combine apple juice, quinoa, and vanilla extract in a large pot; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 15 minutes
Gently fold blueberries into hot quinoa
Pour blueberry mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish
Whisk almond milk, water, and cornstarch together in a small saucepan over high heat
Add lemon juice and maple syrup; cook, stirring constantly, until glaze is thick, 2 to 3 minutes
Pour hot glaze over quinoa to cover it completely
Cover baking dish with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours
